Question
========
  
Of the following, what is the best description of standard error? 
Answerlist
----------
* The standard deviation of the sample distribution.
* The difference between the sample quantity and population value.
* The standard deviation of a sample quantity.
* The difference between the sample distribution and population distribution.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
